thread.title: Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling Are Basically on Vacation While Shooting 'A Wrinkle in Time'
thread.title_full: Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling Are Basically on Vacation While Shooting 'A Wrinkle in Time'

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling Are Basically on Vacation While Shooting 'A Wrinkle in Time'
text: Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling Are Basically on Vacation While Shooting 'A Wrinkle in Time' by Jennifer Drysdale 3:39 PM PST, February 22, 2017 Photo: Instagram Where can we get an office like this? Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling have been hard at work on set of the upcoming A Wrinkle in Time remake, though judging by their Instagrams, calling it "work" is a stretch. WATCH: Oprah Winfrey Celebrates 63rd Birthday With Friends, Pasta and Play-Doh The three actresses have pretty much been on vacation while shooting their new movie. "Never seen a sky like dis. New Zealo is off the chain," Kaling captioned a shot on Instagram on Tuesday. A post shared by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 21, 2017 at 1:54pm PST The Mindy Project star also documented her other activities in New Zealand, like shopping for foreign cookies and relaxing in a hot tub. A post shared by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 21, 2017 at 12:35am PST A post shared by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:41pm PST RELATED: Mindy Kaling Says People Think She's Sandra Bullock’s Assistant on 'Ocean’s Eight' Set Winfrey, meanwhile, boasted about her "ride to work every morning." A post shared by Oprah (@oprah) on Feb 16, 2017 at 7:19pm PST A post shared by Oprah (@oprah) on Feb 14, 2017 at 8:04am PST
